p: No specific therapeutic medicine has been approved for the treatment of SARS-CoV-2 infection. All patients are given empirical antibiotic or antiviral drugs. Moxifloxacin or levofloxacin are empirically used to treat early coinfections with bacteria [ 65]. Linezolid is effective against Streptococcus pneumoniae and Staphylococcus aureus and is combined with nemonoxacin in cases of severe infection [ 65].
